comments.body: Would DAGScheduler not already have these values? maybe not, just checking whether it must be passed back in the message.

I think it's difficult to know from DAGScheduler which barrier stage in a job requires more slots. So a stage which requires more slots need to tell that to DAGScheduler using `BarrierJobSlotsNumberCheckFailed`.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +34,38 @@    BarrierJobAllocationFailed.ERROR_MESSAGE_RUN_BARRIER_WITH_DYN_ALLOCATION)

private[spark] class BarrierJobSlotsNumberCheckFailed(
    val requiredConcurrentTasks: Int,
    val maxConcurrentTasks: Int)
